evidence.text: Pursuant to Fed R. Civ P. 41(a)(1)(A)(ii), Plaintiff the United States of America, along with Defendant the State of Idaho and Defendant-Intervenor the Idaho Legislature, hereby stipulate to the dismissal, without prejudice, of all of the United States’ claims in this action

Pursuant to Fed R. Civ P. 41(a)(1)(A)(ii), Plaintiff the United States of America, along with Defendant the State of Idaho and Defendant-Intervenor the Idaho Legislature, hereby stipulate to the dismissal, without prejudice, of all of the United States’ claims in this action

Pursuant to Fed R. Civ P. 41(a)(1)(A)(ii), Plaintiff the United States of America, along with Defendant the State of Idaho and Defendant-Intervenor the Idaho Legislature, hereby stipulate to the dismissal, without prejudice, of all of the United States’ claims in this action

Pursuant to Fed R. Civ P. 41(a)(1)(A)(ii), Plaintiff the United States of America, along with Defendant the State of Idaho and Defendant-Intervenor the Idaho Legislature, hereby stipulate to the dismissal, without prejudice, of all of the United States’ claims in this action
the Court’s preliminary injunction in this matter (ECF No. 95) is dissolved
